message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $12,500 is a tempting offer, the value of this product is considerably higher.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13,500 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $13,000. Can you consider that?
